Oh, hello. What brings you here?
We were just passing through, but we're going
to help Nerys find her son. She thinks he went
to the White Tower south of the town.
I hope not - its rumoured to be haunted by
Is there anything that you can tell me about
The legends say that a great former ruler of
Garras is imprisoned there - in spirit anyway.
He was a powerful sorcerer. He was also buried
with members of his court, so the rumours say
that they also haunt those halls with him.
I'll keep that in mind, thanks for the help.
